= Quick Start Guide =

This guide will walk you through your first time using Bites by planning a dinner party, so let's get started.

Start up Bites and you'll see the home page with the the main activities. 

|| [http://bites-android.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/main.png] || First let's add an ingredient to our inventory. Click the "Inventory" button and you'll be taken to the Inventory page. ||
